acp.name: BodyHTML
acp.a:expr:
=concatenate("

Hello ",pv!employeeInput.firstname,",

Mentor has been assigned to you. Please contact your mentor in case of any queries for the onboarding process.

Please find your Mentor Details:

Mentor Name: ",concat(user(pv!employeeInput.mentorname,"firstName")," ",user(pv!employeeInput.mentorname,"lastName")),"

Mentor Email: ",pv!employeeInput.mentoremail,"


Thanks You

",concat(user(pv!employeeInput.hiringmanager,"firstName")," ",user(pv!employeeInput.hiringmanager, "lastName")),"

Wayne Enterprises.

")
